name: BNNSMHAProjectionParameters
desc: A structure that contains multihead attention projection parameters.

items.name: init(target_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, weights: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor)
items.desc: Returns a new multihead attention projection parameters structure from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new multihead attention projection parameters structure.

items.name: var target_desc: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor—which is either an input query, key, or value, or an output—of the main target of the operation.

items.name: var weights: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the initial projection’s weights.

items.name: var bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the initial projection’s bias.
